Room.Name: Castle Rutger Road
Room.ShortDescription: This is the bottom of a series of swithcback turns leading up to the castle.
Room.LongDescription: The road is wide and covered with gravel to prevent it becoming a mire during the winter months. Troops must be able to be deployed in a hurry, and it wouldn't look good for them to get stuck on their own road. The road gets very steep to the northeast.
